title: Analyzers prototyping - Infrastructure
body:
### Context

#9627

Responsible for consuming the configuration and loaded modules running the registrations, pumping underlying data to analyzers and wrapping and routing the results.

### Reference
* https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/roslyn-sdk/tutorials/how-to-write-csharp-analyzer-code-fix
* Spike: https://github.com/JanKrivanek/msbuild/blob/0e2b6516808e565dd6bbd40b1d914bac8baab886/src/Build/Analyzers/Infra.cs
